content.query:
Create view dmgold.vDELIVERYDOCUMENTFACT AS 
SELECT [_key_ICUSTOMERPShipToParty]
,[_key_ICUSTOMERPSoldToParty]
,[_key_IDELIVERYBLOCKREASON]
,[_key_IDELIVERYDOCUMENTTYPE]
,[_key_ISALESDISTRICT]
,[_key_ISHIPPINGPOINT]
,[_key_ISHIPMENTBLOCKREASON]
,[_key_ISDDOCUMENTCATEGORY]
,[_key_ISUPPLIER]
,[_key_ISALESORGANIZATION]
,[_key_IWAREHOUSE]
,[_key_ISALESOFFICE]
,[_key_ISALESGROUP]
,[_key_IBUSINESSAREA]
,[_key_IPRODUCT]
,[_key_ICOSTCENTER]
,[_key_IPRODUCTGROUP2]
,[_key_ICONTROLLINGAREA]
,[_key_IDIVISION]
,[_key_IDISTRIBUTIONCHANNEL]
,[_key_IPROFITCENTER]
,[_key_IPLANT]
,[_key_ICUSTOMERGROUP]
,DDI.ACTUALDELIVEREDQTYINBASEUNIT
,DDI.ACTUALDELIVERYQUANTITY
,DD.ACTUALDELIVERYROUTE
,DD.ACTUALGOODSMOVEMENTDATE
,DD.ACTUALGOODSMOVEMENTTIME
,DDI.ADDITIONALCUSTOMERGROUP1
,DDI.ADDITIONALCUSTOMERGROUP2
,DDI.ADDITIONALCUSTOMERGROUP3
,DDI.ADDITIONALCUSTOMERGROUP4
,DDI.ADDITIONALCUSTOMERGROUP5
,DDI.ADDITIONALMATERIALGROUP1
,DDI.ADDITIONALMATERIALGROUP2
,DDI.ADDITIONALMATERIALGROUP3
,DDI.ADDITIONALMATERIALGROUP4
,DDI.ADDITIONALMATERIALGROUP5
,DDI.BASEUNIT
,DDI.BATCH
,DDI.BATCHBYSUPPLIER
,DDI.BATCHCLASSIFICATION
,DD.BILLINGDOCUMENTDATE
,DD.BILLOFLADING
,DDI.BOMEXPLOSION
,DDI.BUSINESSAREA
,DD.CENTRALCREDITCHECKSTATUS
,DD.CENTRALCREDITCHKTECHERRSTS
,DDI.CHMLCMPLNCSTATUS
,DD.COMPLETEDELIVERYISDEFINED
,DD.CONFIRMATIONTIME
,DDI.CONSUMPTIONPOSTING
,DDI.CONTROLLINGAREA
,DD.CONTROLLINGAREACURRENCY
,DDI.CONVERSIONFACTOR
,DDI.COSTCENTER
,DDI.COSTINDOCUMENTCURRENCY
,DDI.CREATEDBYUSER
,DDI.CREATIONDATE
,DDI.CREATIONTIME
,DD.CREDITBLOCKRELEASEDATE
,DDI.CREDITRELATEDPRICE
,DDI.CREDITRELATEDPRICEAMOUNT
,DDI.CUMULATIVEBATCHQTYINBASEUNIT
,DD.CUSTOMERGROUP
,DDI.DANGEROUSGOODSSTATUS
,DD.DELETIONINDICATOR
,DD.DELIVADVNCDSHIPGRCVGRLVNCE
,DD.DELIVERYBLOCKREASON
,DD.DELIVERYDATE
,DDI.DELIVERYDOCUMENT
,DD.DELIVERYDOCUMENTBYSUPPLIER
,DD.DELIVERYDOCUMENTCONDITION
,DDI.DELIVERYDOCUMENTITEM
,DDI.DELIVERYDOCUMENTITEMBYSUPPLIER
,DDI.DELIVERYDOCUMENTITEMCATEGORY
,DDI.DELIVERYDOCUMENTITEMTEXT
,DD.DELIVERYDOCUMENTTYPE
,DDI.DELIVERYGROUP
,DD.DELIVERYPRIORITY
,DDI.DELIVERYQUANTITYUNIT
,DDI.DELIVERYRELATEDBILLINGSTATUS
,DD.DELIVERYTIME
,DDI.DELIVERYTOBASEQUANTITYDNMNTR
,DDI.DELIVERYTOBASEQUANTITYNMRTR
,DDI.DELIVERYTOBASEUNITCNVRSNFCTR
,DD.DELIVERYVERSION
,DD.DELIVISQTYCRRTNADVNCSHIPGRCVG
,DDI.DISTRIBUTIONCHANNEL
,DD.DISTRSTATUSBYDECENTRALIZEDWRHS
,DDI.DIVISION
,DD.DOCUMENTDATE
,DD.EU_DELIVERYARCSTATUS
,DDI.EU_DELIVERYITEMARCSTATUS
,DD.EXPRTINSURCREDITCHECKSTATUS
,DD.EXTERNALTRANSPORTSYSTEM
,DDI.FIXEDSHIPGPROCGDURATIONINDAYS
,DDI.FUNCTIONALAREA
,DD.GOODSISSUETIME
,DDI.GOODSMOVEMENTREASONCODE
,DDI.GOODSMOVEMENTSTATUS
,DDI.GOODSMOVEMENTTYPE
,DD.HDRGENERALINCOMPLETIONSTATUS
,DD.HDRGOODSMVTINCOMPLETIONSTATUS
,DD.HEADERBILLGINCOMPLETIONSTATUS
,DD.HEADERBILLINGBLOCKREASON
,DD.HEADERDELIVINCOMPLETIONSTATUS
,DD.HEADERGROSSWEIGHT
,DD.HEADERNETWEIGHT
,DD.HEADERPACKINGINCOMPLETIONSTS
,DD.HEADERPICKGINCOMPLETIONSTATUS
,DD.HEADERVOLUME
,DD.HEADERVOLUMEUNIT
,DD.HEADERWEIGHTUNIT
,DDI.INSPECTIONLOT
,DDI.INSPECTIONPARTIALLOT
,DDI.INTCOREFSDDOCUMENT
,DDI.INTCOREFSDDOCUMENTCATEGORY
,DDI.INTCOREFSDDOCUMENTITEM
,DDI.INTDELIVERYSCHEDULENUMBER
,DD.INTERCOMPANYBILLINGCUSTOMER
,DDI.INTERCOMPANYBILLINGSTATUS
,DD.INTERCOMPANYBILLINGTYPE
,DD.INTERNALFINANCIALDOCUMENT
,DDI.INTERNATIONALARTICLENUMBER
,DDI.INVENTORYSPECIALSTOCKTYPE
,DDI.INVENTORYVALUATIONTYPE
,DDI.ISCOMPLETELYDELIVERED
,DD.ISCORRECTIONDELIVERY
,DD.ISEXPORTDELIVERY
,DDI.ISNOTGOODSMOVEMENTSRELEVANT
,DDI.ISRETURNSITEM
,DDI.ITEMBILLINGBLOCKREASON
,DDI.ITEMBILLINGINCOMPLETIONSTATUS
,DDI.ITEMDELIVERYINCOMPLETIONSTATUS
,DDI.ITEMGDSMVTINCOMPLETIONSTS
,DDI.ITEMGENERALINCOMPLETIONSTATUS
,DDI.ITEMGROSSWEIGHT
,DDI.ITEMHASVALUEADDEDSERVICE
,DDI.ITEMISBILLINGRELEVANT
,DDI.ITEMNETWEIGHT
,DDI.ITEMPACKINGINCOMPLETIONSTATUS
,DDI.ITEMPICKINGINCOMPLETIONSTATUS
,DDI.ITEMVOLUME
,DDI.ITEMVOLUMEUNIT
,DDI.ITEMWEIGHTUNIT
,DDI.LASTCHANGEDATE
,DD.LASTCHANGEDBYUSER
,DD.LOADINGDATE
,DDI.LOADINGGROUP
,DD.LOADINGPOINT
,DDI.LOADINGPOINTFORDELIVERY
,DD.LOADINGTIME
,DDI.MANUFACTUREDATE
,DDI.MATERIAL
,DDI.MATERIALBYCUSTOMER
,DDI.MATERIALFREIGHTGROUP
,DDI.MATERIALGROUP
,DDI.MATERIALISBATCHMANAGED
,DDI.MATERIALISINTBATCHMANAGED
,DDI.MATERIALTYPEPRIMARY
,DD.MAXDOCVALUECREDITCHECKSTATUS
,DD.MEANSOFTRANSPORT
,DD.MEANSOFTRANSPORTTYPE
,DDI.NETPRICEAMOUNT
,DD.NEXTSHIPPINGDATE
,DD.ORDERCOMBINATIONISALLOWED
,DDI.ORDERDOCUMENT
,DDI.ORDERID
,DDI.ORDERITEM
,DDI.ORIGINALDELIVERYQUANTITY
,DDI.ORIGINALLYREQUESTEDMATERIAL
,DDI.ORIGINSDDOCUMENT
,DD.OVERALLCHMLCMPLNCSTATUS
,DD.OVERALLDANGEROUSGOODSSTATUS
,DD.OVERALLDELIVCONFSTATUS
,DD.OVERALLDELIVRELTDBILLGSTATUS
,DD.OVERALLGOODSMOVEMENTSTATUS
,DD.OVERALLINTCOBILLINGSTATUS
,DD.OVERALLPACKINGSTATUS
,DD.OVERALLPICKINGCONFSTATUS
,DD.OVERALLPICKINGSTATUS
,DD.OVERALLPROOFOFDELIVERYSTATUS
,DD.OVERALLSAFETYDATASHEETSTATUS
,DD.OVERALLSDPROCESSSTATUS
,DD.OVERALLTRDCMPLNCEMBARGOSTS
,DDI.OVERDELIVTOLRTDLMTRATIOINPCT
,DD.OVRLITMDELIVINCOMPLETIONSTS
,DD.OVRLITMGDSMVTINCOMPLETIONSTS
,DD.OVRLITMGENERALINCOMPLETIONSTS
,DD.OVRLITMPACKINGINCOMPLETIONSTS
,DD.OVRLITMPICKINGINCOMPLETIONSTS
,DD.OVRLTRDCMPLNCLEGALCTRLCHKSTS
,DD.OVRLTRDCMPLNCSNCTNDLISTCHKSTS
,DDI.PACKINGSTATUS
,DDI.PARTIALDELIVERYISALLOWED
,DD.PAYMENTTERMCREDITCHECKSTATUS
,DD.PAYTAUTHSNCREDITCHECKSTS
,DD.PICKEDITEMSLOCATION
,DDI.PICKINGCONFIRMATIONSTATUS
,DDI.PICKINGCONTROL
,DD.PICKINGDATE
,DDI.PICKINGSTATUS
,DD.PICKINGTIME
,DD.PLANNEDGOODSISSUEDATE
,DDI.PLANNINGMATERIAL
,DDI.PLANNINGPLANT
,DDI.PLANT
,DD.PRICINGDOCUMENT
,DDI.PRODUCT
,DDI.PRODUCTAVAILABILITYDATE
,DDI.PRODUCTAVAILABILITYTIME
,DDI.PRODUCTGROUP
,DDI.PRODUCTGROUPBASEUNIT
,DDI.PRODUCTHIERARCHYNODE
,DDI.PROFITABILITYSEGMENT
,DDI.PROFITABILITYSEGMENT_2
,DDI.PROFITCENTER
,DD.PROOFOFDELIVERYDATE
,DDI.PROOFOFDELIVERYRELEVANCECODE
,DDI.PROOFOFDELIVERYSTATUS
,DD.PROPOSEDDELIVERYROUTE
,DDI.PURCHASEORDER
,DDI.PURCHASEORDERITEM
,DDI.QTYINPURCHASEORDERPRICEUNIT
,DDI.QUANTITYISFIXED
,DD.RECEIVINGPLANT
,DDI.RECEIVINGPOINT
,DD.REFERENCEDOCUMENTNUMBER
,DDI.REFERENCESDDOCUMENT
,DDI.REFERENCESDDOCUMENTCATEGORY
,DDI.REFERENCESDDOCUMENTITEM
,DDI.RESERVATION
,DDI.RESERVATIONITEM
,DDI.RESERVATIONRECORDTYPE
,DDI.RETURNSDELIVERYITEMCODE
,DDI.SAFETYDATASHEETSTATUS
,DD.SALESDISTRICT
,DDI.SALESDOCUMENTITEMTYPE
,DDI.SALESGROUP
,DDI.SALESOFFICE
,DD.SALESORGANIZATION
,DD.SALESORGFORINTCOBILLING
,DDI.SALESSDDOCUMENTCATEGORY
,DDI.SCHEDULINGAGREEMENTRELEASETYPE
,DDI.SDDOCUMENTCATEGORY
,DDI.SDDOCUMENTITEM
,DDI.SDPROCESSSTATUS
,DDI.SHELFLIFEEXPIRATIONDATE
,DD.SHIPMENTBLOCKREASON
,DD.SHIPPINGTYPE
,DD.SHIPTOPARTY
,DD.SOLDTOPARTY
,DD.SPECIALPROCESSINGCODE
,DDI.STOCKSEGMENT
,DDI.STOCKTYPE
,DDI.STORAGEBIN
,DDI.STORAGELOCATION
,DDI.STORAGETYPE
,DDI.SUBSEQUENTMOVEMENTTYPE
,DDI.SUBTOTAL1AMOUNT
,DDI.SUBTOTAL2AMOUNT
,DDI.SUBTOTAL3AMOUNT
,DDI.SUBTOTAL4AMOUNT
,DDI.SUBTOTAL5AMOUNT
,DDI.SUBTOTAL6AMOUNT
,DD.SUPPLIER
,DD.TOTALBLOCKSTATUS
,DD.TOTALCREDITCHECKSTATUS
,DDI.TOTALNETAMOUNT as TOTALNETAMOUNT_DELIVERYDOCUMENTITEM
,DD.TOTALNETAMOUNT as TOTALNETAMOUNT_DELIVERYDOCUMENT
,DD.TOTALNUMBEROFPACKAGE
,DD.TRANSACTIONCURRENCY
,DD.TRANSPORTATIONGROUP
,DD.TRANSPORTATIONPLANNINGDATE
,DD.TRANSPORTATIONPLANNINGSTATUS
,DD.TRANSPORTATIONPLANNINGTIME
,DDI.VARBLSHIPGPROCGDURATIONINDAYS
,DDI.WAREHOUSE
,DDI.WAREHOUSESTORAGEBIN
,DDI.[_UpdateTimeStamp]
,DDI.[_SystemName]
 FROM [dmgold].[I_DELIVERYDOCUMENT] DD, [dmgold].[I_DELIVERYDOCUMENTITEM] DDI
 where DD.Deliverydocument = DDI.deliverydocument
 and DD.[_SystemName] = DDI.[_SystemName]
